ModMetaData.name: Tanker Framework
ModMetaData.author: Sokyran, Hush
ModMetaData.description:
Do you like my mods? You can support me on Ko-Fi:: https://ko-fi.com/sokyran
Adds a framework for a storage tanker, designed to be used with SRTS shuttles.
It allows the ability to store oil, chemfuel (Rimefeller), water (Dubs Bad Hygiene), and Helixien gas (Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Power).
